channel.title: Adding own name to quest tab
channel.description: I just was wondering how to change the quest tab text (which for me is construction tab) and the bank name? I tryed to find a tut or use the ''FIND'' thing in my windows for the name the bank has, but nothing showed up! Is it in the cache and if it is how to change it??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 24, 2009, 07:19:32 am[/size][hr]Problem solved this was too easy to get stuck on...sorry

item.title: Adding own name to quest tab
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

I think you do that in your source not client

Read full topic
